pages.text: The piping system in my machines allows me to transfer their contents automatically.
I can insert potions into the top slot by transferring items from top or bottom, and containers into the bottom slot by transferring items from any other side.
I can insert fuel and phials from top or bottom, and other ingredients from any other side. I can also read a comparator signal to determine how many more potions can be done with current materials.
I can insert potions from any side, but I can't extract them in any way, so I shouldn't use it as a storage.
